headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now. Engine anti-ice operations are flagged at Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV). Across base airports: 2 critical, 23 high, 6 medium, 8 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Chişinău (RMO/LUKK); plus 22 other bases. 6 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and low cloud base  — most notably around Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and London Luton (LTN/EGGW). Network hotspots: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Billund (BLL/EKBI) and 2 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, cold‑temperature performance penalties and snow / blowing snow. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 0 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 1.2 km, cloud base around 200 ft | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 700 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa (TIA/LATI) — HIGH: strong gusts risk and 19 others. Worst affected now: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; freezing precipitation / icing risk (drivers: engine anti-ice operations, low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints) | Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 700 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, very low visibility, low ceilings) | Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH) — CRIT: freezing fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, crosswind limitations) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) and 1 others. Changed since last run: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC), London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY), Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) and 2 others.
